faq.question: How do I enroll in a course?
faq.answer: You can browse our course catalog, select a course, and click “Enroll Now” to begin registration and payment.

faq.question: Can I switch to another course after enrollment?
faq.answer: Yes, course switching is allowed within 3 days of enrollment, if the new course is of equal or lesser value.

faq.question: Do I need prior experience?
faq.answer: Some courses require prior knowledge, while beginner courses are designed for freshers. Please refer to the prerequisites in the course description.

faq.question: Are the courses self-paced or instructor-led?
faq.answer: We offer both. Each course specifies whether it is self-paced, live online, or classroom-based.

faq.question: How long will it take to complete the course?
faq.answer: Completion time varies by course and learner pace. Most courses take between 4–8 weeks.

faq.question: How will I be assessed?
faq.answer: Assessment methods vary but usually include quizzes, assignments, and final projects.

faq.question: What are the prerequisites for the course?
faq.answer: Each course has specific prerequisites, listed in its description.

faq.question: Can I access the course on mobile?
faq.answer: Yes, our platform supports mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.

faq.question: What are the system requirements to access the course?
faq.answer: A modern browser and stable internet connection are sufficient. Some courses may need additional tools.

faq.question: How long do I have access to the course materials?
faq.answer: Self-paced courses offer lifetime access. Instructor-led course access may be time-bound.

faq.question: Do you provide certification after completion?
faq.answer: Yes, all courses offer a certificate of completion. Some professional programs provide globally recognized certifications.

faq.question: Do you offer any career or placement support?
faq.answer: Yes, select programs offer resume reviews, interview prep, and placement assistance.

faq.question: Is there a refund policy if I’m not satisfied with the course?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer a refund within 7 days of enrollment, subject to our refund policy.

faq.question: Are there any discounts or offers available?
faq.answer: We frequently offer seasonal discounts and promo codes. Subscribe to our newsletter for updates.

faq.question: Can I pay in installments?
faq.answer: Yes, installment or EMI options are available for some high-value courses.

faq.question: What if I have doubts during the course?
faq.answer: We provide doubt-clearing sessions, forums, and mentor/instructor access for all courses.

faq.question: Who do I contact for technical support?
faq.answer: Contact our support team via the Help Center or email support@example.com.

faq.question: Do you offer group or corporate training?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide customized corporate training packages. Please contact our sales team.
